tool.name: lastdb + lastal
tool.description: Index the reference genome + align fasta/fastq
tool.help:
lastal: please give me a database name and sequence file(s)
Usage: lastal [options] lastdb-name fasta-sequence-file(s) Find and align similar sequences.
Cosmetic options: -h, --help: show all options and their default settings, and exit -V, --version: show version information, and exit -v: be verbose: write messages about what lastal is doing -f: output format: TAB, MAF, BlastTab, BlastTab+ (default=MAF)
